resources.string: Would you like to make a profile?
Profiles help us find groups that match your preferences better.
You have successfully created a \"SPORT\" group!
Little to no experience playing. This may be your first time playing or you have played very infrequently.
Some amount of experience playing. You aren\'t exactly new to the game, but you wouldn\'t consider yourself a \'good player\' either.
Good amount of experience playing. You have played the sport for a decent amount of time, and may have a working knowledge of the fundamentals required for the sport.
High level of experience playing. You have been playing the sport for a long time and are probably extremely knowledgeable about the game.
Your goals are to have fun, meet new people, or try out a new activity.
Your goals are primarily to improve your skills or find others to compete with.
Your goals include a mix between casual and competitive.
